Texts.Chs:
Harpies are a race of colourful half-humanoid, half-bird individuals. They come from a distant and uncharted planet covered in dense jungles, and share some notable traits with Avians.

  ^orange;食性^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;天赋^reset;:
   能量x^green;1.1^reset;, 伤害 x^green;1.05^reset;
  +^green;30^reset;% 跳跃 速度, +^green;5^reset;% 跳跃 Height, Fall 伤害 x^green;0.35^reset;
  ^green;抗性^reset;: +^green;15^reset;% Shadow, +^green;25^reset;% Electric, Cosmic
  Tech: ^green;Harpy Slowfall^reset;

^orange;环境^reset;:
  When airborne: 伤害 x^green;1.12^reset;
  Low to moderate wind: Air mobility
  Low wind: HPx^green;1.15^reset;, Defense x^green;1.1^reset;

^orange;武器^reset;:
  Bow: +^green;20^reset;% 暴击伤害, 伤害 x^green;1.12^reset;, +^green;5^reset;% 速度, +^green;10^reset;% Draw 速度
  Short Spear: 伤害 x^green;1.06^reset;, +^green;1^reset;% 暴击几率

^red;弱点^reset;:
  HPx^red;0.9^reset;,
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;30^reset;% Ice, -^red;25^reset;% Poison, -^red;5^reset;% Physical
Texts.Eng:
Harpies are a race of colourful half-humanoid, half-bird individuals. They come from a distant and uncharted planet covered in dense jungles, and share some notable traits with Avians.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Energy x^green;1.1^reset;, Damage x^green;1.05^reset;
  +^green;30^reset;% Jump Speed, +^green;5^reset;% Jump Height, Fall Damage x^green;0.35^reset;
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;15^reset;% Shadow, +^green;25^reset;% Electric, Cosmic
  Tech: ^green;Harpy Slowfall^reset;

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  When airborne: Damage x^green;1.12^reset;
  Low to moderate wind: Air mobility
  Low wind: Health x^green;1.15^reset;, Defense x^green;1.1^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Bow: +^green;20^reset;% Crit Damage, Damage x^green;1.12^reset;, +^green;5^reset;% Speed, +^green;10^reset;% Draw Speed
  Short Spear: Damage x^green;1.06^reset;, +^green;1^reset;% Crit Chance

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Health x^red;0.9^reset;,
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;30^reset;% Ice, -^red;25^reset;% Poison, -^red;5^reset;% Physical
